channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO

item.title: Report X-2023110228
item.description:
Report X-2023110228

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-28
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING ON A IRREG TRAM. RESPONDER BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA. RESPONDER CLEANED THE TUG WITH ABSORBANT TOWELS AND CLAY. PLACED THE BUCKET IN A LINED TRAY AND PROCEDED TO PROCESS THE DMN.

item.title: Report E-2023110029
item.description:
Report E-2023110029

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: MARSHFIELD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that due to a forklift puncture, approximately .75 gallons of Acetone (hazardous - UN1090) was released. The released product was contained to the dock floor and has dried, the remaining product and damaged jug were placed into a 25 gallon metal drum and staged onsitel for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023110046
item.description:
Report X-2023110046

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: One of the gallon jugs cap was loose allowing contents to leak out during transit. (Motion of trailer going down Hwy caused movement of liquid to cap allowing leakage.) DescribePack: Cap was not secured tightly and when box experienced motion and came in contact with loose lid contents leaked out. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: Box opened and lid secured.

item.title: Report X-2023110031
item.description:
Report X-2023110031

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: SAINT PETERS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: i was told it happened in the unload, it was in the cage when i got to it. it was properly placed in a yellow drum. DescribePack: small crack at the top of the lid causing a leaking hazmat. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and put in a sealed hazmat tote.
